duties_responsibilities.duty: Present instructions in a designated subject area in a regular classroom setting.
Promote a positive and desirable atmosphere within the classroom setting to ensure maximum student motivation.
Maintain a high degree of discipline within the classroom setting to ensure maximum learning.
Utilize all possible curriculum resources available.
Maintain student personnel folders and records.
Prepare reports such as student/staff hours, requisitions, and monthly student evaluations.
Clearly communicate and consistently model appropriate employability skills and maintain accountability of staff, students, and property.
Cultivate and maintain a climate on the center that is free of harassment, intimidation, and disrespect to provide a safe place for staff and students to work and learn.

education_certification.credential: Certified to teach in the state where the center is located. Valid driver’s license with acceptable driving record preferred.
